comment: This file holds templates and serves as a documentation file for the task's data structure
.comment: You can copy & paste these and fill them with real data. Do not delete this file!
..comment: Make sure to give each task a unique (ascending) id and place images in ./source/assets/osa_images
...comment: Mark images with a leading [img] and then the image name. You also have to add the image to the ImageMapper (Screens/helper)
....comment: You can just copy the whole thing for a new topic, delete these comment lines and customize your tasks.
.....comment: Each .json file should have the following structure:
